sentences.en: And if they can do it, why couldn't your nosy neighbor?
sentences.cn: 如果他们能这麽做, 你那好管闲事的邻居又何尝不可?

sentences.en: Do not get nosy, or you will get into trouble!
sentences.cn: 别好管闲事, 不然你会惹麻烦的!

sentences.en: Do you feel like your neighbors are being nosy?
sentences.cn: 那你现在觉得你的邻居好奇心太重了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Don't be so nosy—it's none of your business.
sentences.cn: 别管那么多闲事—这与你无关。

sentences.en: Don't ever get nosy or you will get into trouble.
sentences.cn: 别那么多管闲事,你会碰到麻烦的.

sentences.en: Finally, may be a bit nosy, but it is also fact.
sentences.cn: 最后, 可能有点八卦了, 但却也是事实.

sentences.en: He flipped through my letters in his nosy way.
sentences.cn: 他以他的窥探心态翻看我的信.

sentences.en: He was having to whisper in order to avoid being overheard by their nosy neighbours.
sentences.cn: 他不得不小声说，免得被爱管闲事的邻居们听到。

sentences.en: I agree that the press is often too nosy about a candidate's personal history.
sentences.cn: 的确，媒体常常过分关注候选人的个人经历。

sentences.en: Lee is really nosy. He's always asking about everybody's love life.
sentences.cn: 李很八卦, 总是打听别人的感情生活.

sentences.en: Our nosy neighbours are always looking in through our windows.
sentences.cn: 好管闲事的邻居总是从我们的窗口望进来.

sentences.en: Protect your computer from nosy people and boost computer performance now!
sentences.cn: 保护您的计算机不受八卦人民和提高计算机的性能,现在!

sentences.en: Some nosy people should stop poking their noses into her divorce.
sentences.cn: 那些爱管闲事的人,应该停止干预她的离婚.

sentences.en: Those people hanging out next door nosy.
sentences.cn: 经常聚集在隔壁的那些人吵闹的很.

sentences.en: To make a long story short, he's very nosy.
sentences.cn: 长话短说, 他太好管闲事了.

words.tran_cn: 大鼻子的；爱追问的（等于nosy）
鼻子；嗅觉；突出的部分；探问
好管闲事的；爱追问的；大鼻子的

trans.tran_cn: <口>好管闲事的，包打听，有香味（或臭味）的，大鼻子的
trans.tran_en: always wanting to find out things that do not concern you, especially other people’s private affairs
